item.title: Nissan's Response (?) to my LEAF® Home Screen Widget
item.description: Previously On # Last year I wrote about my side project to create an iPhone home screen widget for my Nissan LEAF® electric car since Nissan’s official NissanConnect® EV & Services iPhone app does did (!

item.title: Nissan's LEAF® App Doesn't Have a Home Screen Widget So I Made My Own for Free
item.description: Nissan’s App # Nissan’s official NissanConnect® EV & Services iPhone app:

item.title: Porting Game Boy Emulators to the Pebble Time
item.description: I worked on UI and graphics firmware at Pebble from April 2015 until the company was acquired by Fitbit in December 2016.
